settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make the theme customizable.
Use class="color" on a an input tag to bring up the color picker. Only a few colors have been included here as an example.

settings.label: Primary
settings.info: Used for text links, and primary buttons

settings.label: Secondary
settings.info: Used for secondary buttons

settings.label: Custom logo
settings.info: Maximum logo dimensions are 450px wide by 200px high. The uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.

settings.label: Max logo width
settings.info: Defined in pixels. Do not add the 'px' unit.

settings.label: Sticky menu
settings.info: Check this option to make the menu sticky. Incompatible with the , 'Vertical ' menu. Sticky do not working on mobile devices.If the menu will be is sticky on mobile devices when you open it - you can not click on the last item, because it will always be outside the screen.

settings.label: Dropdowns Animation
settings.info: Select the type of animation to displaying dropdowns. Warning: Animation correctly works only in the latest versions of progressive browsers.

settings.label: Numer lever menu
settings.info: Lever dropdown menu

settings.label: Text Color Of The First Level item
settings.info: Color lever 1

settings.label: Text Color Of The First Level item active
settings.info: Color lever 1 when active

settings.label: Background Color first lever
settings.info: Background Gradient (Color) Of The Primary Container

settings.label: Background Color first lever active
settings.info: Background Gradient (Color) Of The Primary Container active

settings.label: Background Image Of The Primary Container
settings.info: You can choose and tune the background image for the primary container..

settings.label: Text color dropdown menu
settings.info: Text Color Of The Dropdown  Menu Item

settings.label: Text color dropdown menu active
settings.info: Text Color Of The Dropdown active  Menu Item

settings.label: Background Color dropdown
settings.info: Background  (Color) Of The Dropdown Container

settings.label: Background Color dropdown active
settings.info: Background  (Color) Of The Dropdown Container active

settings.label: Background Image Of The Dropdown Container
settings.info: You can choose and tune the background image for the Dropdown container..

settings.label: Font Of The First Level Item
Font size
settings.info: Unit pixel

settings.label: Twitter URL
settings.info: Example: https://twitter.com/shopify

settings.label: Facebook URL
settings.info: Example: https://www.facebook.com/shopify

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action)

settings.label: Twitter handle
settings.info: Example: @shopify
